name: icai-cors-proxy
description: InChambers CORS Proxy for OpenRouter - Cloudflare Worker
author: InChambers

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: **Required**: Your OpenRouter API key from [openrouter.ai/keys](https://openrouter.ai/keys). This key enables access to 11 premium AI models (Claude, GPT, Gemini, Grok, DeepSeek, Mistral).

REGISTRATION_TOKEN.description: **Required**: Copy the registration token from your InChambers Organization Admin Dashboard → AI Platform → Generate Token. This enables automatic proxy URL registration.
